Uses of Interface
org.relationlearn.model.RelationDigraph

  • Packages that use RelationDigraph 
    Package Description
    org.relationlearn.model
    Provides facilites for in-memory representation of the input data obtained with any of the InputParser possible implementations.
    org.relationlearn.util
    Provides utility methods, classes and enumerators for common tasks performed by other package classes.
    org.relationlearn.util.io
    Provides facilites for the parsing of input data and the generation of output data in multiple formats.

    • Uses of RelationDigraph in org.relationlearn.model

      Classes in org.relationlearn.model that implement RelationDigraph 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DigraphImpl
      RelationDigraph implementation that stores the ArgumentNode objects in a Map.

    • Uses of RelationDigraph in org.relationlearn.util

      Constructors in org.relationlearn.util with parameters of type RelationDigraph 
      Constructor and Description
      InstanceGenerator(RelationDigraph graph, FilterGroup filter)
      Constructs a new Instances generator with graph as the source of data and filter as the TextFilter objects container.

    • Uses of RelationDigraph in org.relationlearn.util.io

      Methods in org.relationlearn.util.io that return types with arguments of type RelationDigraph 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,RelationDigraph> InputParser.parseInput(String uri)
      Parses data at a given URI and generates a Map containing as many RelationDigraph instances as the implementation is able to find in the URI provided.
      Map<String,RelationDigraph> XMLFileParser.parseInput(String uri)
      Parses a given XML file and returns a Map containing all RelationDigraph objects found in it.
      Method parameters in org.relationlearn.util.io with type arguments of type RelationDigraph 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DLVFileGenerator.generateOutput(Map<String,RelationDigraph> graphTable, String basePath)
      Generates a group of .dl files taking as base path the parameter basePath.
      void DOTFileGenerator.generateOutput(Map<String,RelationDigraph> graphTable, String basePath)
      Generates a group of .dot files taking as base path the parameter basePath.
      void OutputGenerator.generateOutput(Map<String,RelationDigraph> graphTable, String outputUri)
      Using the data provided in graphTable this method generates an output in the outputUri parameter.
      void XMLFileGenerator.generateOutput(Map<String,RelationDigraph> table, String path)
      Generates an XML file with the data provided by table in the output path path
